sentence.Network_en: Briefly speaking, Independence of procurator means procurators independently exercise procuratorial power.
sentence.Network_cn: 简要地说, 检察官独立就是检察官独立行使检察权.

sentence.Network_en: Inacted as procurator inthus upholding the clients'rights under the law.
sentence.Network_cn: 为境外客户成功追讨回被欠货款,维护了当事人的合法权益.

sentence.Network_en: The procurator referred a public charge against him.

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English (denoting a steward): from Old French procuratour or Latin procurator 'administrator, finance agent', from procurat- 'taken care of', from the verb procurare (see procure)

entry.tran: （前苏联）检察长；（天主教）教会官员；（古罗马帝国的）地方行政官员
entry.def: A procurator is an administrative official with legal powers, especially in the former Soviet Union, the Roman Catholic Church, or the ancient Roman Empire.

means.word_mean: 1. a person authorized to act for another
2. (ancient Rome) someone employed by the Roman emperor to manage finance and taxes

auth_sentence.content: The Procurator Fiscal will decide whether the five men are to be charged.
auth_sentence.res_content: The Procurator Fiscal will decide whether the five men are to be charged.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The Procurator Fiscal will decide whether the five men are to be charged.
